original_text:
Whoever walks in integrity will be delivered,
    but he who is crooked in his ways will suddenly fall.
korean_text: 성실하게 행하는 자는 구원을 받을 것이나 굽은 길로 행하는 자는 곧 넘어지리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever walks in integrity will be delivered
but he who is crooked in his ways will suddenly fall
sentences.korean_translation: 그 길이 비뚤어진 자는 갑자기 넘어지리라.
